scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:common: npm version patch --prefix projects/common && ng build common && npm publish ./dist/common --access public
scripts.deploy:ent-demo-forge: ng build ent-demo-forge --prod && npm publish ./dist/ent-demo-forge --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-assets-config-manager: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-assets-config-manager && ng build lcu-el-assets-config-manager && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-assets-config-manager --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-assets-domain-input: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-assets-domain-input && ng build lcu-el-assets-domain-input && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-assets-domain-input --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-assets-domain-view: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-assets-domain-view && ng build lcu-el-assets-domain-view && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-assets-domain-view --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-sln-assets: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-sln-assets && ng build lcu-sln-assets && npm publish ./dist/lcu-sln-assets --access public
